author: kelvingoodson
msg: Reintroducing the dependency on the backport concurrent library that was introduced in TUSCANY-1006 for java 1.4 support and inadvertantly removed in commit  r579414.  Adding a test to ensure that we have a specific threadsafe hashmap on the classpath,  rather than letting ChangeSummaryImpl fall back on Collections.synchronizedMap(new HashMap()).  Have tested against maven 2.0.7 and a clean repo,  which was the issue reported in the above referenced commit.

author: trustin
msg: Fixed issue: DIRMINA-533 (NPE in OrderedThreadPoolExecutor and UnorderedThreadPoolExecutor)
* Added null check to both executor

author: mbaessler
msg: update whitespace character definition, CONNECTOR_PUNCTUATION (e.g. "_") should not be treated as a whitespace
character. It is now treated as special character. The tokenization doesn't change since in both cases the token is split up.

author: gnodet
msg: Upgrade to released mina and latest geronimo servlet jar

author: amita
msg: explicitly add for inclusion of sdo-apir2.1
